guidenumericbox.jcr:title: Business Number
guidenumericbox.longDescription:
For Canadian organizations, the Business Number is a federal numbering system which is assigned to a business (one number per business) by the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA). A complete Business Number has two parts: the registration number (first nine digits) and the account identifier (two letters and four digits). For registration, we require only the first nine digits of your Business Number. For more information please visit the CRA (Canada Revenue Agency) website.

For non-canadian organizations, this is the incorporation or registration number assigned to your organization in the country in which it is incorporated or registered.
guidenumericbox.name: egcs_crabusinessnumber

orgshortnametf.jcr:title: Organization Short Name
orgshortnametf.longDescription: This is a short version of your Organization Name, created by you. It will be used for identification purposes. You may be asked to choose a new Organization Short Name if that name has already been chosen by another organization in the system. Your Organization Short Name can be up to 8 characters long. You can use letters and numbers. You cannot use spaces, punctuation or special symbols. For example, An organization called "Western Manufacturing" could choose the short name: WestMan or Wmanu or WMfg.
orgshortnametf.name: gac_organizationshortname
orgshortnametf.validatePictureClauseMessage: Cannot use spaces, punctuation or special symbols.

orgLegalName.jcr:title: Organization Legal Name
orgLegalName.longDescription: The Legal Name is the name that appears on your organization's financial statements, bank statements and other legal documents. It is the name that must appear on contractual documents and purchase orders between Global Affairs Canada and your organization, as well as on your organization's invoices and on payments made by Global Affairs Canada to your organization.
orgLegalName.name: orgLegalName

guidetextdraw._value: English or French Legal Name is a required field.
guidetextdraw.name: legalNameErrorMsg

orgOperationalname.jcr:title: Organization Operating Name
orgOperationalname.longDescription: The organization's operating name is the name by which your organization is known to its clients and to the public. It is the name used in the course of day-to-day business and usually appears in the telephone directory and on your organization's business cards, letterhead, signs and other promotional items. Note: It may be the same as the legal name or the name of the individual. Example: Legal name: G W Line Ltd. Operating name: Canadian Tire.
orgOperationalname.name: orgOperationalname

guidetextdraw_166494._value:
Notes to Applicants

  1. In this section, Applicants can upload supporting documentation needed for a decision regarding their application 
  2. It is mandatory to download, fill and upload a current copy of Form 2555E (Declaration regarding outstanding debts due to her Majesty). 
    • This form can be downloaded at:
      • https://www.international.gc.ca/department-ministere/assets/pdfs/forms-formulaires/2555e.pdf
  3. All other files are optional 
  4. Accepted file formats can be .pdf,.doc,.docx, .xls, .xlsx,.png,.jpg,.gif, 
  5. It is important to label each uploaded file for easy identification 
  6. Each file size may not exceed 10MB 
  7. Applicant can upload as many files as needed 
  8. If you wish to make changes to file, Delete the uploaded file by selecting X on the corresponding file and upload a new one after deletion
guidetextdraw_166494.name: textdraw_16649440071584109239046

fileattachment.mandatoryMessage: At least one document is required.
fileattachment.name: fileAttachment

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.profiles.toolbar.submitNext"\,"event":"Click"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var currentPanel = window.guideBridge.getFocus({\\"focusOption\\": \\"navigablePanel\\"});\\nvar currPanelName = window.guideBridge.resolveNode(currentPanel).name;\\npreviousNamePanel.value = currPanelName;\\n\\nvar myList = [];\\nif(guideBridge.validate(myList\,this.panel.navigationContext.currentItem.somExpression))\\n{\\n submitConfirmationPanel.visible = true;\\n profiles.visible = false;\\n wantToSubmit.value = null;\\n window.guideBridge.setFocus(wantToSubmit);\\n}"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guideradiobutton_cop.jcr:title: Are you sure you want to update your profile?
guideradiobutton_cop.name: wantToSubmit

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.submitConfirmationPanel.section.wantToSubmit"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var myList = [];\\nvar sUerProfilePanel = userProfilePanel.panel.navigationContext.currentItem.somExpression;\\nvar sOrgProfilePanel = orgProfilePanel.panel.navigationContext.currentItem.somExpression;\\nvar sLegalStatusDocPanel = legalStatusDocPanel.panel.navigationContext.currentItem.somExpression;\\n\\nif (this.value == \\"1\\") {\\n if(guideBridge.validate(myList\,sUerProfilePanel) ||guideBridge.validate(myList\,sOrgProfilePanel))\\n {\\n \\tguideBridge.submit(); \\n }\\n else{ \\n profiles.visible = true;\\n submitConfirmationPanel.visible = false;\\n }\\n}\\nelse {\\n profiles.visible = true;\\n submitConfirmationPanel.visible = false;\\n}\\n\\nif(previousNamePanel.value === 'userProfilePanel' ){\\n userProfilePanel.visible = true;\\n window.guideBridge.setFocus(salutation);\\n}\\nelse if(previousNamePanel.value === 'orgProfilePanel' ){\\n orgProfilePanel.visible = true;\\n window.guideBridge.setFocus(ddEgcs_organizationprofile);\\n}\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guideradiobutton_cop.jcr:title: Are you sure you want to cancel? You will lose any unsaved work.
guideradiobutton_cop.name: wantToCancel

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.cancelConfirmationPanel.section.wantToCancel"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"model":{"nodeName":"EVENT_SCRIPTS"}\,"content":"var objSOM = window.guideBridge.resolveNode(previousNamePanel.value);\\nvar panelName = window.guideBridge.resolveNode(objSOM.somExpression).name;\\n\\nif (this.value == \\"0\\") {\\n cancelConfirmationPanel.visible = false; \\n profiles.visible = true;\\n \\n if(panelName === 'landingPagePanel' ){\\n landingPagePanel.visible = true;\\n window.guideBridge.setFocus(proposalsTable.headerRow.editOrgProfile);\\n }\\n else if(panelName === 'profilesPanel' ){\\n profilesPanel.visible = true;\\n window.guideBridge.setFocus(userName);\\n }\\n \\n}\\nelse if (this.value == \\"1\\") {\\n window.open('https://pi.international.gc.ca/pages/public/welcome-accueil.xhtml'\,'_self');\\n}\\n\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"var myList = [];\\nif(guideBridge.validate(myList\,this.panel.navigationContext.currentItem.somExpression))\\n{\\n \\tif(returnInviteCode.value === \\"true\\"){\\n \\t\\twindow.guideBridge.setFocus(this.panel.somExpression\,'nextItem'\,true);\\n \\tnotificationPanel.visible = false;\\n }\\n else\\n {\\n notificationPanel.visible = true;\\n inviteCode.value = \\"\\";\\n }\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.toolbar.button1597237451767_copy_1"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
fd:scripts.fd:navigationChange: [{"script":{"content":"if(getFocusPanelName() === 'registrantRegLoginPanel'){\\n this.visible = false;\\n}\\nelse if(getFocusPanelName() === 'registrantInviteCodePanel'){\\n this.visible = true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n this.visible = false;\\n}"\,"event":"Navigation"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.toolbar.button1597237451767_copy_1"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

[{"script":{"content":"if(getFocusPanelName() === 'registrantRegLoginPanel'){\\n this.visible = true;\\n}\\nelse if(getFocusPanelName() === 'registrantInviteCodePanel'){\\n this.visible = true;\\n}\\nelse{\\n this.visible = false;\\n}"\,"event":"Navigation"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.toolbar.button1597237451767"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
